New Records: Freddie Freeman homered for the third straight game
Key Match Events: Freddie Freeman watched his two-run home run in the first inning of Game 3 of the World Series
The Dodgers beat the Yankees 4-2 on Monday night for a 3-0 lead in the Fall Classic
Buehler and six relievers combined on a five-hitter for the Dodgers
Pre-Game Insights: Superstar Shohei Ohtani played despite a partially dislocated left shoulder
Post-Match Reflections: The Dodgers moved within one victory of a surprising sweep in this much-hyped matchup between traditional powers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers are on the cusp of their second championship in five years and the eighth in franchise history
The game was played on Monday night
Others: The Los Angeles Dodgers beat the New York Yankees 4-2 on Monday night
